page.title: 20EDUCATION
page.content:
{LISNAGELVIN PRIMARY SCHOOL}was opened in January 1978,to cater for the children of the {KILFENNAN}area.It is divided into {PRIMARY ONE,MIDDLE }and{ {SENIOR }areas. It has a {T.V.}room,an{ {AUDIO_VISUAL }room, a {COMMUNITY}room, a {CANTEEN,}an {ASSEMBLY HALL}and a { {SPORTS HALL.}There are also work areas outside the classrooms. The school has 530 pupils and 22 teachers.
{CREDITS This project was completed by pupils from {LISNAGELVIN PRIMARY SCHOOL, { FAUGHAN VALLEY HIGH and { ST.BRECAN'S HIGH. Special thanks are owed to {KATRINA BEDDING }and{ { DEBORAH CALLAN }whose computing skills proved invaluable.
